com.st.st25sdk.command

Interface Type2CommandInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NdefType2Command, STType2Tag, Type2Command, Type2Tag

    public interface Type2CommandInterface
    Defines the common methods to be implemented to build NFC Forum Type2 commands

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] read(byte blockNumber)
      Command to read data from type2 tag
      byte[] sectorSelect(byte sectorNumber)
      Sector Select process used to address physical memory bigger than 1KB (1024 Bytes) in type2 tag
      byte[] sectorSelectCmdPacket1()
      Sector Select command packet 1 used initiate Sector Select command in type2 tag
      byte[] sectorSelectCmdPacket2(byte sectorNumber)
      Sector Select command packet 2 used to address physical memory bigger than 1KB (1024 Bytes) in type2 tag
      byte[] write(byte blockNumber, byte[] data)
      Command to write data to type2 tag

    • Method Detail

      • read

        byte[] read(byte blockNumber)
     throws STException
        Command to read data from type2 tag
        Parameters:
        blockNumber - address to read data
        Returns:
        16-bytes read data
        Throws:
        STException

      • write

        byte[] write(byte blockNumber,
             byte[] data)
      throws STException
        Command to write data to type2 tag
        Parameters:
        blockNumber - address to read data
        data - 16-byte data to be written
        Returns:
        tag's response
        Throws:
        STException

      • sectorSelectCmdPacket1

        byte[] sectorSelectCmdPacket1()
                       throws STException
        Sector Select command packet 1 used initiate Sector Select command in type2 tag
        Returns:
        tag's response (ACK response if some sectors can be selected, NACK response else)
        Throws:
        STException

      • sectorSelectCmdPacket2

        byte[] sectorSelectCmdPacket2(byte sectorNumber)
                       throws STException
        Sector Select command packet 2 used to address physical memory bigger than 1KB (1024 Bytes) in type2 tag
        Parameters:
        sectorNumber - sector number from 0x00 to 0xFE (0xFF is RFU)
        Returns:
        tag's response
        Throws:
        STException

      • sectorSelect

        byte[] sectorSelect(byte sectorNumber)
             throws STException
        Sector Select process used to address physical memory bigger than 1KB (1024 Bytes) in type2 tag
        Parameters:
        sectorNumber - sector number from 0x00 to 0xFE (0xFF is RFU)
        Returns:
        tag's response
        Throws:
        STException
